summary: Annotation in Latin and Old English on a blank space on the recto of final leaf of an s. xii2 manuscript of Latin Vitas patrum, after a note in Latin about Godric’s hymn which Ker judges to be ‘in a different, but contemporary hand’. Ker also notes an inscription on fol. 1, possibly of s. xiiex, from Biddlesden Priory, Bucks (1957, p. 40).

notes.head: Addition
notes.body: (fol. 149) Sancte marie uirgine moder iesu cristes nazarene onfo scild help þin godric onfang bring hehtlic þið þe i godes Riche

admin: Manuscript described by Mary Swan and Owen Roberson with the assistance of Johanna Green, with reference to published scholarship; ed. by Takako Kato (2010; 2013).
